events.name: Recovery - 45 min (INDOOR)
events.description: Warm-up, easy pedaling at 45-55% FTP. Keep cadence 85-95 rpm. Focus on recovery and good form. Hydrate well.

events.name: Tempo - 3x8' @ 80–85% (INDOOR)
events.description: Warm-up, then 3 sets of 8 minutes at 80-85% FTP with equal recovery. Cadence 85-95 rpm. Focus on smooth pedaling and breathing. Hydrate and fuel lightly.

events.name: Recovery - 45 min (INDOOR)
events.description: Easy pedaling at 45-55% FTP. Cadence 85-95 rpm. Focus on recovery and relaxation. Hydrate well.

events.name: Recovery - 45 min (OUTDOOR)
events.description: Easy outdoor ride at 45-55% FTP. Cadence 85-95 rpm. Focus on recovery and enjoying the ride. Hydrate well.

events.name: Endurance Z2 - 3h (INDOOR)
events.description: Long endurance ride at 62-71% FTP indoors. Maintain cadence 85-95 rpm. Start fueling within 15-20 min: 80-100 g carbs/hr, 700-1000 mg Na/hr, 600-900 ml fluid/hr. Hydrate and fuel consistently. If forecast clears → OUTDOOR 4–6 h.

events.name: VO2 - 5x2' @ ~115% (INDOOR)
events.description: Warm-up, then 5 intervals of 2 minutes at 110-115% FTP with 4 minutes easy recovery. Cadence 85-95 rpm. Focus on smooth efforts and recovery. Hydrate and fuel lightly.
